This game is the best. The graphics are amazing, the story is thrilling, the characters are likeable and puzzles are fun and thought-provoking. Definitely worth the money I spend on this game and I totally recommend it as well.
Hilarious, joyful. A sequel that surpasses the brilliant Portal 1 in every way... and then out of nowhere adds a bunch of totally new stuff that's also excellent.
Back again with more puzzles! More story! More funnies! Love it.
Its valve. Whats not to love?
Are you really reading reviews for Portal 2? Just play it already!

3元白菜价入手的，关卡解密真心有意思，难度适中，视觉效果也很棒

This game has amazing graphics, storyline and gameplay. It is a thoroughly entertaining game and you should definitely purchase it.

this is an AMAZING GAME, with an amazing story and enjoyably funny characters with twisted, dark but delightful humour in their jokes, in conclusion i would highly recommend this game! (oh, there is also a co-op mode to play in the game with your friends and with others online which is great to work together to solve infinite puzzles and test chambers) 
THANKS VALVE!!!!!(oh also pls make Portal 3)

Ok, this was an absolutely amazing game I enjoyed it as far as it went with the coop campaign and it was great. I got to have a lot of fun with my coop partner and we became great friends, this game is truly an amazing experience whether you're playing with strangers or friends you can always gain something from this if you get along to figure puzzles out!
Best to play with a friend in CO-OP and then ruin your friendship by killing each other in many diffrent ways.
Took a lot of thinking to finish. This had tons of puzzles and the story was good too. 10/10
